step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Ensure you feel that resistance to help pump lymph.
You're doing well opening your hand wide. Keep those fingers spread to maximize the pumping action.
Excellent fist-making and muscle tightening while inhaling. This is key for effective lymph movement.
Great job relaxing and opening your hand while exhaling. Visualize the fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and open your hand wide. Squeeze into a fist as you inhale, then relax as you exhale to help move fluid.
